review_blob: Pours a burnt orange/copper with a curtain of haze. Nice collar of off-white foam. Nectarine, citrus aromas along with an acidic alcohol smell similar to what wine gives off. Good carbonation and nice balance. No over powering flavors or anything thats easily distinguishable. Light bitterness. Dry and slightly metallic finish.
beer_name: Samuel Smiths Organic / Old Brewery Pale Ale
